name: useScript
description: Custom hook that dynamically loads scripts and tracking their loading status.

props.name: src
props.description: The source URL of the script to load. Set to `null` or omit to prevent loading (optional).

props.name: options
props.description: Additional options for controlling script loading (optional).

schema.name: removeOnUnmount
schema.description: If `true`, removes the script from the DOM when the component unmounts (optional).

schema.name: shouldPreventLoad
schema.description: If `true`, prevents the script from being loaded (optional).
